citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, no dedicated and readily identifiable attendant was present to monitor public contact. This was a
petting zoo located at a county fair with multiple separate primary enclosures. There were attendants manning a station
selling feed, but they were not facing the animal enclosures and were not monitoring the animals while public contact was
occurring. The inspector observed interactions during a period of 20-30 minutes between visitors and animals to include
feeding and the attendants were distracted with other activities.
Without an attendant, animals are at greater risk of experiencing physical injury and behavioral stress, and members of
the public may be at greater risk of injury. Correct by ensuring that a responsible, knowledgeable, readily identifiable
attendant is always present during periods of public contact.
To be corrected from this day forward, July 27, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
